tool_description: Analyzes contextual patterns in historical text samples to understand how words were used in different semantic and syntactic environments.

text_samples.description: Array of text samples containing the target word

target_word.description: The word being analyzed for contextual usage

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: semantic, syntactic, pragmatic, comprehensive

context_window.description: Number of words before and after target word to analyze (5-50)

error_messages: Insufficient text samples: Provide at least 5 text samples for meaningful analysis.
Text samples too numerous: Reduce to maximum 500 samples for processing efficiency.
Invalid context window: Window size must be between 5 and 50 words.
Target word not found: The target word does not appear in the provided text samples.
usage: Input text samples from Corpus Text Extractor along with the target word. Specify analysis type and context window size. Returns detailed contextual usage patterns and classifications.

semantic_contexts.description: Semantic environments where the word appears
